text: Sachin Chaudhary (born-30 September 1983) is an Indian powerlifter. Chaudhary represented India at the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London, United Kingdom, and finished 9th in the men's -82.50 kg event. He took the silver medal at the 2017 Powerlifting World Cup in Dubai with a career-best lift of 200 kg. He competed at the Para powerlifting at the 2018 Commonwealth Games where he won a bronze medal in the Para powerlifting at the 2018 Commonwealth Games â€“ Men's heavyweight event. == References == Category:Paralympic competitors Category:Indian weightlifters Category:1983 births Category:Living people
title: Sachin Chaudhary
